Html: I optimized my gear with no added items (so it couldn't change out items), I basically wanted to see how it would socket my armor set based on the ArP nerf. What i found was kinda weird that in 2.2.14 it socketed all STR and then 2.2.15 it socketed all ArP, kinda hard to believe everyone saying we will start socketing STR after the nerf and Rawr is telling me to actually go to it. Also another bad vibe I'm getting is the dps reading in 2.2.14 is 5.4k and on 2.2.15 its 3.7. Is the ArP really gonna hurt are dps that much? Has anyone else played with the numbers between the 2 versions?
Do you have the same set of buffs? Do you have the same rotation? Posting a save file would help, too.
Yeap everything is the same. I don't change anything. How do you post a save file on here?
